description: Search for skills by one or multiple tags (up to 5) in a single query. Returns skills where the tags field contains ANY of the specified tags. Examples: tag1='aws', tag2='tco'.

configuration.query:
FROM agent_skills 
| WHERE MV_CONTAINS(tags, ?tag1) 
     OR MV_CONTAINS(tags, ?tag2) 
     OR MV_CONTAINS(tags, ?tag3) 
     OR MV_CONTAINS(tags, ?tag4) 
     OR MV_CONTAINS(tags, ?tag5) 
| SORT rating DESC 
| LIMIT ?limit 
| KEEP skill_id, name, domain, tags, short_description, rating

tag1.description: First tag to search for (required). Example: 'aws', 'aerospace', 'compliance'

limit.description: Maximum number of skills to return (default: 10)
